website_summaries.verdict: Lots of organic plant ingredients including seaweed, cayenne, and peppermint helps stimulate, slim, and smooth skin.
pros: A very pronounced menthol tingle when applying — almost like IcyHot —with a pleasant minty fragrance
It was also noted as working well at improving under-eye puffiness (caution advised)
An instantly visible, if temporary, fix that’s perfect for using before hitting the beach
cons: The product is very thin and watery, so can be messy to apply

customer_reviews.title: Green Tea & Lime Smells like very strong men's afteshave - horrible
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the very first time - applying it about 30 minutes ago or longer and the smell is so overwhelming. It's very manly and very strong and I am going to have to go wash it off. Total waste. I had used the regular version and it also smells bad, but nothing like this. I was hoping this one would be an improvement. The other version seems to have some small effectiveness, but the smell was irritating so I figured I would give this one a try. I think I will keep looking for a product with a better scent. Thinking it's mostly women using this stuff, so why make it smell so extremely manly?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reader

customer_reviews.title: No More Cellulite!
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle spilled when I opened it because I wasn't expecting it to be so runny and thin. I contacted Body Merry and they immediately sent me another one. I've been using this for about 6 months and definitely see a difference...I no longer have cellulite on the back of my legs! I wanted to purchase it again but it is no longer available on Amazon. Guess I will have to go directly to the source. Thanks for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Freeland

customer_reviews.title: I cant imagine using this product as recommended, they say use twice a day
customer_reviews.text: I cant imagine using this product as recommended, they say use twice a day. It feels like icy hot and you wouldn't want to wear pants after applying, walking around in shorts while your legs cool off twice a day is not practical. Not sure if this is working or not-- I use probably 3-4 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: momma

customer_reviews.title: It really does work
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The only con is the smell, but it goes away after about 15 minutes. It does have a weird cooling "bengay" type feeling on your skin, but that wears off after about a half hour. HOWEVER, this tightens your skin and makes cellulite A LOT less noticeable. I've struggled with cellulite at 18 and 130 pounds and I still struggle with it in my late 30s and at 170 pounds (working on losing weight). This product really helps my confidence during shorts season.
customer_reviews.author: jid679

customer_reviews.title: Cellulite Cream
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the cellulite cream for about a week and I can see a difference already. It works great and the fragrance is really nice. You feel refreshed after applying it and there is no stain to the clothes or bedding. Will purchase again. Definitely well recommend it to others
customer_reviews.author: COW-ley GAL

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff! Not only does it help with cellulite, it feels super minty on your skin. Like when you brush your teeth with a very minty toothpaste then drink some water but on your skin! I would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking to smooth out some cellulite. I also purchased the stretch mark remover that also works almost instantaneously. After just one use my stretch marks were noticeably less red. I love it love it love it!
customer_reviews.author: ElanaExtraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as it used to be.....
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat disappointed... I used to Love this stuff! Since they changed their formula, its not the same smell. The old one used to be a brown color and smell like mint chocolate chip. This new one is just very minty! Love Body Merry products, just sad its not the old stuff. Please bring the old stuff back!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product. If you’re looking for a retinol product don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very misleading regarding its new formulation that doesn’t include retinol. All of their descriptions on amazon mention retinol but the actual bottle replaces retinol with coconut oil. Even the box I received the “coconut oil” bottle in said retinol... I feel played.
customer_reviews.author: Lloryn

customer_reviews.title: Liquid NOT cream.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this almost a year ago with several other creams I was trying out. . I recently opened this jar expecting a cream. What I got was a liquid which poured out on my floor. Maybe it should have an expiration date. I looked at the answers for this product and did not feel that the questions about why it is watery have been answered. properly. It is not enough to state that 'You should return it f you are not happy with it'. Is it even safe to use? Very disappointed in this product and the 'Body Merry Company.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Leaves residue behind
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Smells nice. Con: This product leaves a residue behind no matter how well you rub it into your skin. When dry it becomes white and flaky. Terrible. Never had a moisturizer do this. This cream is also filled with lots of tiny white strands of fiber that remain behind on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jax5

customer_reviews.title: Menthol-y, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I don't care very much for the smell of this product, so I tend not to use this very often. The smell is strong, and lingers on your skin for a long time. It smells a bit like many mentholated muscle rubs. Update: From 2 stars to 5 stars! Body Merry's excellent customer service and willingness to stand behind their products makes this company's products worth giving a try even if you're not sure which item is the best choice. Body Merry will also provide recommendations for the right product if you're not sure, or if you've found this isn't the one. Not many companies do business like this- very admirable!
customer_reviews.author: gobby148

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE AVOID BUYING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail today... And i have to say this is the absolutely WORST!!!! #💯💔👎💩😡😬😧 i read the reviews... The good and the bad... And did my research... DO NOT BUY THIS... I JUST PUT THIS ON AS DIRECTED AFTER MY SHOWER AND I HAD TO SHOWER IT OFF IMMEDIATELY!!!! It really does BURN and not a little... IT BURNS A LOT!!! I felt like my inner thighs (problem area) were on FIRE!!! 🔥 🔥🔥 it smells like vicks but your skin starts to heat up like boiling hot water was just dropped on you... VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!! Take my WARNING!!!
customer_reviews.author: ANASTASIA.NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Watery product!
customer_reviews.text: The cream that I received is not the “gel cream” as it is supposed to be (and I know because this is not the first time I am ordering this product). It is extremely watery! It is not a cream or a gel. It is colored water! You need a spoon to get it out. I can’t even get it out with a little spatula which I used all other times. By the way, the spatula should even be included with this cream as it is much healthier and better than getting the cream out with your hands. I am extremely dissatisfied with this order and I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Strong Smell of Menthol
customer_reviews.text: This has a very intense menthol smell. I wasn't aware menthol was necessary for cellulite defense. I dont like leaving my house smelling like Ben Gay so I can only use this at night. Do not use right after bathing or showering as it will burn. I will continue to use itn but if I do not see any marked results I will not be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Liz in Maine

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this for a few months not ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few months not, not really consistent but I am convinced that it works. I have probably used up 2 jars. I will continue to use it. Consistency and persistence are key in anything that you do. I believe that with consistent application this would give real results. I have seen reviews of people that say these types of products just don't work. I have to wonder if they are expecting too much of the product. If you have moderate cellulite and want to smooth your skin this will help. If you need to lose a few pounds or more than a few, this won't help.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this product for the backs of my legs. So far, I can say I love it. It seems to be working slowly but surely, but I still would use it never the less. It makes your skin feel really cool and tingly, and has an almost minty scent to it! After applying, your skin does feel much more smooth, and the tingly-mint feeling almost makes it feel tighter, it's wonderful! Would definitely recommend this, and for the price it's worth a try! :)
customer_reviews.author: KMasi

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious cream...
customer_reviews.text: I am a HUGE FAN of Body Merry products, and couldn't WAIT to try this cream based upon the reviews. It was delivered in record time; therefore, its too early to determine if it'll work for me at this point, but I will do a follow up {by the way, I haven't any doubt that this will work}. It has a medicinal smell, and once I applied the cream, it immediately began tingling with a cooling effect. I'm giving this four stars instead of five because of the smell. I wish this was offered in an odorless cream because I don't want to walk around all day, nor go to bed every evening smelling this way.
customer_reviews.author: LadydiamondT

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, smells great
customer_reviews.text: This is full of natural ingredients, good for your skin! The cream is very light, like whipped yogurt. It absorbs quickly and has a yummy scent. The warming sensation dissipates after about 15 minutes and my skin feels like it's tightening. I use the massage roller after it dries to help break up the underlying fat cells.
customer_reviews.author: Divadi

customer_reviews.title: You can’t just rely on the cream.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time. With diet, exercise (squats), and this lotion and using a cellulite brush together consistently it helps with the cellulite. But you can’t just use the lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... it it really doesn't work unfortunately it wasn't a good
customer_reviews.text: Same thing here with this cream I don't see any difference it doesn't matter how many times you do it it really doesn't work unfortunately it wasn't a good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I 1st brought this product 1-20-20. But wasn't consistent with it. So I brought it again 5-4-20. I've been using it consistently every other day. I definitely see a difference on the back of my thighs. I plan on continuing the process for 6 months. I would definitely recommend this product. It's a little thick so you have to RUB it in.
customer_reviews.author: T-Bear

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive to ingredients
customer_reviews.text: This product does give a slight tightening appearance to the skin. I used it on my upper outer thigh and butt. It does have a tingle, so be careful where you apply and wash your hands. The reason I only gave it 4 stars is because it caused me joint pain in my hips. I am very sensitive to ingredients in products. I have no allergy to anything in this product that I can see. However, if you tend to be sensitive to creams, understand that this IS absorbed, like other things put on the skin, and the caffeine for me caused joint pain. Not the fault of the company.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Product works great!
customer_reviews.text: have to say this product works great! I have been only using it for a few days and I can already see a difference. I mostly just use it on my upper legs. I can't wait to see what they look like after a whole week of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: I love the minty smell of it
customer_reviews.text: This product works! But, although this product did minimize the look of cellulite, it requires constant use in order to maintain the results. Once you stop, it all comes back. Also, I love the minty smell of it, it's relaxing and tingles. I recommend this product to anyone who is able to use it continuously and consistently.
customer_reviews.author: Anna R

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the wonderful reviews. I agree- within 2 days of using the cream my legs look dramatically better. I used it on my arms and they look better too. I love the tingling sensation it leaves for 30-60 minutes afterwards. I will have to try their facial products too if this works so well.
customer_reviews.author: aging gracefully

customer_reviews.title: Is it supposed to be watery????
customer_reviews.text: The one I received is very watery. Is it supposed to be like that? I've been using it but it is really runny when I try to get it out of the jar. I haven't seen any results yet but I haven't used it for a whole month yet so I would like to give it more time. I want to order another one but I'm not sure if I'll just receive another watery one. I've seen pictures of a thicker gel that looks more creamy. The one I got is like brown water. How can I contact the company?
customer_reviews.author: cmgiron94

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t tell a difference. But I also guess that would be because there was only enough product for 4 uses on my thighs. I won’t be buying this again. I did like the smell and it gave you a cooling and tingling sensation after you put it on
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product just to try it out as I haven't had much luck with creams for Cellulite. While this product didn't get rid of all of it, it cleared so much up and allowed me to feel comfortable in a bikini again. I love it and honestly just a little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: SMcDearmont

customer_reviews.title: Obviously, there is no magic cream that eliminates cellulite ...
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, there is no magic cream that eliminates cellulite. However, using this cream regularly has made the skin on my legs and butt softer, smoother, and firmer. It contains ingredients I recognize with no strong fragrance, which is what I have been looking for lately in my skin care. If you want to get rid of cellulite, exercise and a healthy diet are the only answer, but using this product twice daily as directed has definitely improved the appearance of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: works great, I saw results in about 1-2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: works great, I saw results in about 1-2 weeks, also helps if your working out , I use a cellulite brush first then i use the cream, works great!
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Mixed Feelings
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this product. First, if used twice a day, I saw results. Second, although I like the smell of menthol, I do not want to go shopping with the smell of having a sports injury. Third, all these types of products are very expensive when you consider how much you need to use them ... Twice a day on large areas. Body Merry's products are reasonably priced, even this one, but this would be a pretty expensive habit. I am going to see if once a day is worth the price. At once week of use I am already through 1/2 the jar.
customer_reviews.author: GmaDar

customer_reviews.title: This is a good cream which I would put on at night after ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cream which I would put on at night after a shower. It totally tingles so it leaves your legs (thighs) very fresh feeling...a bit cool. After a few days of usage left my legs super smooth. Super Good cooling cream! I put it on after a shower and it totally leaves a mintly cooling sensation on your legs or area you apply it! You can see results in a matter of days and your skin starts to feel softer. Add a great diet and workout and you will be happy!
customer_reviews.author: Cynderella503

customer_reviews.title: I didnt have much faith when i tried it out but to see how it works on cellulite is amazing. I could see the difference within t
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible cream. I didnt have much faith when i tried it out but to see how it works on cellulite is amazing. I could see the difference within the first week. It does tingle when you put it on but it's not uncomfortable and subsides relatively quick (or i sleep off before i realize and wear it at nights) I highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: OktoberB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very unique product. It is not a heavy cream but a nice consistency that rubs in easily. Must tell you that it will make your skin feel a bit "chilled" when first applied. I have noticed a reduction in cellulite. I have been please with several other Body Merry products and the excellent customer service. They will follow up with you to make sure you are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Seems a bit more watery the second time around...
customer_reviews.text: Was this product changed? It seems to be more watery than the first jar I ordered and the burn is not as strong with this second jar either. The first jar definitely showed signs of progress. I definitely saw a difference and my skin is softer and smoother in certain areas. I am not sure if this second will work the same way it seems to be less potent - I hope I'm wrong!
customer_reviews.author: J B.

customer_reviews.title: Smoothing out those bumps
customer_reviews.text: We all are plagued with the "cottage cheese" regions, no matter our age. This is part of the solution!! It won't make you look skinny or lose weight, but it will smooth those areas and make cellulite less prominent. This is not an overnight change....the longer you use it, the more effective it becomes. Ready for smoother curves? Try this out! It really works.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product every day for one month and have noticed a difference. I think it is a combination of stepping up my workout routine, getting a summer tan, and this product, but I think this product is a key factor (as I have worked out my whole life and not noticed any changes in cellulite). Worth the purchase! I don't know if it is scientific at all, but it 'feels' like it is working when it tingles. Also, added bonus, it smells like thin mints!
customer_reviews.author: DaniKatarina

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting, noticable results
customer_reviews.text: I found this product on a list of one of the best cellulite regimens and saw nothing but amazing reviews. I've been using this product religiously for a few months now and I still have much of it left. A little goes a long way and I love the tingly feeling after applying, makes me aware that the product is really working. I would recommend purchasing a massager with this scrub so you can maximize the results of this product. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Miles

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared for a icy/ hot experience
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product after getting out of the shower and with a hand held cellulite massager for a couple weeks, and I can see a difference. The only thing I didn't care for about this product is that it has some sort of mentholated ingredient in it, and when I first used it, I wasn't prepared for the intense icy sensation on my body! It was so cold that I had to go outside of my home where it was warmer ( I had the AC on). I really don't like that because the effects take awhile to wear off.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and company....
customer_reviews.text: I received this in the mail yesterday and used it last night before bed and this morning before work. It feels simply amazing on my skin. There's a cool, soothing feeling you get after you've applied it. I haven't had enough time to see the effects on cellulite, but I can tell you I've already ordered a second jar to have on hand because I already love this product! As I've seen others state below, the customer service I received from this company was amazing. They followed up with a email to give me tips on using the product. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Shumate

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far (Warning: It does get a bit cold though!)
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this gel a couple times now and although it is too soon for me to see any results, I do like it so far! I also have to say that this seller is very friendly & nice - Does an email follow up to see if you have any questions and if you are liking the product! I have since ordered a few of their other products to try out. - I love that these products are natural. And all of the positive reviews encourage me to try out other products in their line.
customer_reviews.author: bmh922

customer_reviews.title: Feel like your skiing down a mountaintop
customer_reviews.text: I have noticed positive changes in skin texture, and my skin doesn’t display the allergic reaction I have to the Nivea toning moisturizer. Best of all, it makes my skin feel like a York peppermint patty, unlike some other creams that feel like burning. I recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Escha Daybreak

customer_reviews.title: Body is Merry with this Body Merry Cellulite Cream
customer_reviews.text: Excellent packaging and speedy delivery. This cellulite cream has a tingling sensation when applied and has a "spa" smell that makes you feel like it is working. Having just started using it, I cannot say what results I will receive but I am very encouraged. This product line is backed by a 90 day guarantee making it even more inviting. Update to follow after using Body Merry Cellulite Cream with Caffeine for an extended aount of time.
customer_reviews.author: lexxi18

customer_reviews.title: Feels the Burning sensation
customer_reviews.text: So I must say when I put it on I feel the burning Sensation. It feels like something is happening or working but I really didn’t see much results, I bought and use 2 but maybe I should’ve done it more
customer_reviews.author: ButterRican

customer_reviews.title: Careful Shopper
customer_reviews.text: It does get rid of cellulite, and I have tired several products. However, it does take several months. One of my legs is clear of cellulite and the other is getting better.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Yaughn

customer_reviews.title: Feeling perplexed
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this product when I got it. I've been using this product for approximately a month and have yet to see results. I love the texture and the tingly feeling when i put the product on however there are no results for me. I hope others have better results than I do. I gave the product three out of five because it does work as a good lotion just not as intended for cellulite reduction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon305

customer_reviews.title: Spicy
customer_reviews.text: Makes my butt feel spicy. It actually does look really nice after application. Didn’t use it expecting a miracle and wasn’t disappointed :)
customer_reviews.author: Mo & Chris

customer_reviews.title: What a great find this was
customer_reviews.text: What a great find this was!!! I am 32, and have struggled with cellulite most of my adult life. This cream definitely feels wonderful, tingly from the menthol. The menthol smell dims to a nice light floral scent. The cream is especially soothing on my legs after a run. I also have very sensitive skin, and I find that this lotion adds the right moisture without irritation. Would recommend this to just about anyone, as long as you don't mind a menthol smell for the first hour or so after use!
customer_reviews.author: Finding Beauty in the Little Things

customer_reviews.title: Cold, cold, cold.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really notice much of a change in my thighs when I used it, but then again I looked like a beached whale. I just remember having to layer up after slathering some of this stuff on because it would cool my legs and I would feel like I was freezing my nuts off. I probably lost some cellulite just from how much fat I burned from shivering.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Searls

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Great product with smooth non greasy texture. The only thing is that I would use this during the summer since the menthol makes you feel freezing after a while lol. It helped in reducing the cellulite I had during my pregnancy and my skin now looks smoother and firmer. Great value for the price. Definitely beats the other expensive brands and you can see the results very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually tightens your skin on contact
customer_reviews.text: So far I’ve use this every day and I really like it it tingles your skin and it seems to actually titan were the areas where you use it I love the scent and it is a very nice product
customer_reviews.author: Renee Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: I tried this cream and I am really happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: I always had some circulation problems that foster the appearance of cellulite on my legs, especially during the summer. Exercise alone wasn't always enough. I tried this cream and I am really happy with the results! You have to use it constantly for a couple of weeks (at least this is what happened in my case) but you can definitely see improvements. Moreover, I love the fresh sensation that leaves after the application.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks like melted down tan colored pudding and feels like it too. But the smell is a nice cookie mint. Rubs in nicely to the skin. Leaves you feeling icy cool and rejuvenated. We will see about it helping cellulite over time.
customer_reviews.author: Honest co.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it works but smells great
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that I really see a difference but it smells good and really moisturizes. May consider buying not for cellulite, but maybe as a foot cream.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Loving the results!
customer_reviews.text: That's the second time I've ordered this cream and it's just amazing. It works for it's purpose and gives you a refreshing feeling after applying on the skin. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rayza Occelli

customer_reviews.title: This was a very good option for me
customer_reviews.text: I really see an improvement using this product. I have not the most common types of cellulite on my legs, it's very lumpy and large. I went to a plastic surgeon to see what he could do for me. I was told he might be able to improve the appears of the cellulite by maybe 30% at a cost of $7,000.00. This was not a very good option for me. I have been using this cream for about 2 months and I'd say I have achieved 30% or better in results. I'm hoping with continued use, this will go up. Needless to say, I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: sandi G.

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely amazing! Be patient
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely amazing! Be patient, give it time, use exactly as directed, and you will see remarkable results. Definitely worth every penny--money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Sims

customer_reviews.title: great brand! great smell!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it last night. It smells good, tingles your skin and makes my skin feel great. After all reviews. I have seen that it gives results, it's worth a shot! The stretch mark cream from Body Merry has already made my stretch marks lighter with one use!
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: The last cellulite cream you'll ever buy
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this cream twice now and I LOVE it. I can't believe the improvement to my stomach area. I have a feeling this summer I will actually be able to wear a bikini and feel comfortable. I apply it after my shower, the scent may turn some people off but I really enjoy the smell and it goes away once the cream dries. I can't wait to try other body merry products!
customer_reviews.author: Reads a lot

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This product does as it says recommend the results are not immediately but with about a two week use you can start seeing the results.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: I did enjoy the cool feeling of the cream and it helped ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this cream with a cellulite massager and saw a reduction in cellulite. However, I also had changed my diet and started working out more simultaneously when I using this cream. I did enjoy the cool feeling of the cream and it helped to use on sore muscles as well. Body Merry sent me several emails to ensure my satisfaction with the product and even gave me a coupon code for another product of theirs. The customer service was superb. I would highly recommend this company.
customer_reviews.author: Ana421

customer_reviews.title: Good product and may have been working a bit but ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product and may have been working a bit but using very little and ran out quickly. Contacted the seller and ther are amazing. Such good customer service! I may not be 100% satisfied with the product (didn't last long enough to tell). But very good experience with the seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gel
customer_reviews.text: This gel is amazing ... been using 2 times a day for just a little while and I am seeing a difference... for the smell shake the bottle around .. it also has this cooling feeling which is great especially at night
customer_reviews.author: Brklynmom

customer_reviews.title: Should have known better-complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Should have known better-complete waste of money! I am 60 yrs old & eat right & work out & not overweight. Just the normal bumpy cellulite & crepey skin you get as you get older. Used this with a cellulite massager 2x daily for 3 weeks faithfully with absolutely NO visible difference unless you want to count the bruising from massager.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I was most definitely skeptical buying this product as it seemed too good to be true because lets be honest cellulite is hard to get rid of! I used this every morning and night when i got out of the shower and saw a noticeable difference after A WEEK!!! I would absolutely recommend this product and i have to a few of my girlfriends! Will be buying again wehn i am out :)
customer_reviews.author: janina

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I have definitely noticed a great improvement with my skin on my legs: cellulite has been decreased and my skin has tighten up. I've been exercising and watching what I eat for a while now, but I did not notice much of an improvement on my legs until using the Body Merry Cellulite Cream. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. L.

customer_reviews.title: just using your hands won't get you great results as fast
customer_reviews.text: I'm only on day 3 of using this twice a day, but I am LOVING it so far. DEFINITELY use the TopNotch� Cellulite Remover Massager along with this cream, that's why I'm already feeling a difference in my skin is combining that massager with the cream, just using your hands won't get you great results as fast :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liquid , not gel or cream , no results .
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of the good reviews but I'm starting to think they were phony. The order arrived and the stuff inside the jar is not a gel or a cream, it's really liquidy. I'm beginning to wonder if this was expired or what? I've used a lot of it along with working out and eating healthy but I have seen no results with my cellulite. Not a fan
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. The first day or two I put WAY too much and I was FREEZING. The third day I tried a little less and it actually felt good. I also have seen a difference in the way my thighs look. They aren't bumpy anymore like they were before.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Body Merry - Nice Company!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a couple of years. I use it in the hopes of minimizing the crepey skin on my arms. I really like the feel of the product (gel) and the tingling sensation is great and the smell is good too. Not sure anything can really do much for crepey skin but I do see some reduction immediately after I use the product. I think Body Merry's prices are fair and I plan on trying the eye cream soon. I definitely recommend doing business with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: I massage the nice smelling gel into my skin and let it dry ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this product seems to make a difference! I use it 2 times a day, if possible, but trying for at least once per day. I massage the nice smelling gel into my skin and let it dry and then use a massager for 5 or 10 minutes. My cellulite is less noticeable and I for sure am buying more! I have also been doing squats and lunges, hoping to find a way to get rid of the much hated cottage cheese. But this product seems amazing and I am sold!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Consistency changed
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this product, but the consistency has changed. It's now quite watery. Hopefully this is a fluke because it used to be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I love the smell and texture
customer_reviews.text: My second order of this stuff and it really does what it is supposed to. I used to have quite a problem with cellulite, and this with work out really helps! I barely notice much of my cellulite anymore, and I love the smell and texture. It gives you kind of a very tingling feeling when applied but it does its job really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this working but I was pleasantly surprised that it did. It takes a couple weeks to see a difference but I was pleased with the way it evened out my skin on the backs of my thighs. It does have a cooling sensation but I like that too! I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Subiegirl04

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company!
customer_reviews.text: I really can't get enough of this stuff. When I use it regularly I've absolutely noticed a difference. I do need to keep up with it daily though. I'm ordering my third cream and I also received a promo code to get another product for 50 cents that I'm excited to try. Great company and customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Tuba Ozel

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for at least 5 months, I also work out and eat right however it works great!
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying this is my first review. I don't usually take the time for these things but I felt this product was good enough it deserved a few minutes of my time. 3 pregnancies in 5 years had done a job on my stomach. It looked horrible! I purchased this hoping it would help my stomach look more toned and firmer. After 1 use I could tell a definite difference, now after 5 days of using twice a day, it has made my stomach a lot firmer and smoother, visually it has done an amazing job. I am thrilled. Not for sure how long term, but as a easy quick fix, this has done great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Menthol City!
customer_reviews.text: The stuff just reeks of menthol. Menthol is what companies out into products to convince you something's "working". This is so stinky and makes your thighs feel ice cold, so I hardly ever used it. Therefore, I can't attest to it's efficacy. However, it does a great job of clearing your nasal passages or as a muscle bracing cream (kind of nice after my training runs).
customer_reviews.author: McKenna

customer_reviews.title: love this! ! i noticed a difference in just 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Ive only been using a couple weeks and I've already noticed a difference! I highly reccomend this. Only reason why I give a 4 star is because it has a very strong smell to it. But I can tollerate it. If your very sensitive to strong smells, this wouldn't be something you would like. But it does work great!!!! I'm buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Bradlie

customer_reviews.title: ... the first few weeks I used it but just like icy hot it burns your hands when it starts ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was working the first few weeks I used it but just like icy hot it burns your hands when it starts working even if you wash them really well after applying. You also get a burning sensation in the areas you use it. I didn't see much of a difference and when I stopped using it for a few days all my cellulite came back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light breezy Cellulite Cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream that I have been using is working good so far not complaints.it tightens(firms) me up. I love the tingling feel,like it is working the minute you put the cream on and then the massager brush just solidifies the whole process. The only thing is just my son & husband ,doesn't like the smell, I love the smell it's like sort of a fresh sea breeze scent and my dimples are becoming less visible, I think..I have never tried others but this one seems to be doing the trick.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at a similar product when I stumbled upon this from the Body Merry line. The ingredients and more positive user comments convinced me to try this product instead of the other. I have been using this for just a couple of weeks and I've been told that most people see results after 6-8 weeks. So while I can't claim noticeable results just yet, I can say that the cream/gel goes on very nicely, leaves a wonderfully cool sensation on my legs, smells clean and fabulous, and that my legs feel a bit firmer.
customer_reviews.author: D Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Delivered quickly and as described
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Delivered quickly and as described. Texture is a bit different than what I expected and takes a little getting used to. It is more of a gel consistency which is great for distributing. A little goes a long way. Makes your legs feel amazing and rejuvenated. Does help the appearance when used daily.
customer_reviews.author: LovedByYates

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok an noticed a difference but if you don't put it on every night for the rest of your life basically it comes back pretty quick. And with the amount you get in this bottle, not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jos

customer_reviews.title: I really like the product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product. I have only been using a little over a week and it claims it takes 8 weeks to see improvement. I wish it came in a larger container with 2x a day use it is going fast. I need to order more already.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: I eat very clean and workout 6 days a week ...
customer_reviews.text: I eat very clean and workout 6 days a week, but I still struggle with cellulite. I used this after exfoliating twice daily for 2 months, but did not help at all with cellulite.
customer_reviews.author: tlnyg

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortably Cold After Using This
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this product because the mint in it makes me uncomfortably cold after I use it. My legs and stomach feel like they are freezing. I don't know if it works because I don't want to use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: GreatStuffNow

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice on the skin but zero results after 3 weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work! Feels nice on the skin but zero results after 3 weeks with twice a day application. There is no magic fix for cellulite. We all just have to eat well, hydrate a lot and hit the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Gio Skylar

customer_reviews.title: My kids tell that smells like coke.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. My skin looks smoother and I like the smell, when my children come into the room tell me that smells like coke. Almost disappoints me the first time I used it, because I was expecting another kind of cream, to help me sweat when exercises, I was expecting it was warmer, but this cream leaves the skin very, very soft, you can feel that nourishes. I will keep using it because I like the way it lets my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Suany Rosario

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it...
customer_reviews.text: I got the cellulite defense and started to use the jar, but my daughter asked me if she could try it. So, of course being a nice dad, I did. She loves it and I got two more for her. She said she saw a big difference in legs so now she is going to start using it on her body...
customer_reviews.author: Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Like the other reviewers
customer_reviews.text: Like the other reviewers, I just can't get past the SUPER cold feeling of this product, so I couldn't use it for any length of time to notice any difference. Also, It would be better in a tube than a jar and it's not super thick.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Ok I normally LOVE LOVE LOVE Body Merry products
customer_reviews.text: Ok I normally LOVE LOVE LOVE Body Merry products. But for the price, the amount you receive is insufficient PLUS this stuff smells horrible. So far this is the ONLY product i've been disappointed in.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah N. martinez

customer_reviews.title: I tried consistently and the company has wonderful feedback and are ready to assist
customer_reviews.text: I tried consistently and the company has wonderful feedback and are ready to assist. Unfortunately I noticed no cellulite difference.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: this product is about making you feel great. so far
customer_reviews.text: this product is about making you feel great. so far, i have had for a month and it has done just that. is my cellulite gone? no, but it looks firmer. my thighs are very smooth now and am impressed what it has done for me thus far. i am confident that by the time another month goes by it will look even better. i will not being trying body merry moisturizer. body merry has wonderful customer service and i hope to make them a favor brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The consistency was good and absorbed quickly
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't notice a difference and I am not too sure about the smell. The consistency was good and absorbed quickly,. I just wish it work as well as they claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I haven't been using it like I should because of that feeling so
customer_reviews.text: He leaves this very tingly kind-of burning feeling. I haven't been using it like I should because of that feeling so...
customer_reviews.author: Claudina

customer_reviews.title: It's working great. I will be buying more
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this Cellulite cream for a week so far. I use it with a cellulite roller, and when working out in exercise sweat pants. It's working great. I will be buying more. FYI: Has a someone minty smell and tingle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say I notice much of a difference but that's probably due to the fact that I can't stand to use this product everyday. It has menthol (that stuff in Icy Hot) so to use it on my thighs on a busy morning and then allow it to dry just won't do. Glad I tried it, though!
customer_reviews.author: Yotama

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. I smell like a peppermint latte from Starbucks ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I smell like a peppermint latte from Starbucks and it's so watery. Tried to return through amazon link and it won't accept. DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Rivera-Maurice

customer_reviews.title: Runny and Messy
customer_reviews.text: I’m not 100% if the product works or not, but I can say the presentation was horrendous. This product is so runny and leaked all over the box. It had a safety cover and it still is all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

product_meta.title: Body Merry Cellulite Defense Gel-Cream - Anti Cellulite Body Treatment for Firming & Toning w/Natural Caffeine + Coconut Oil + Peppermint (Original, 4oz)
feature_bullets: SMOOTHS SKIN - Stay BEACH BODY READY all year round with Body Merry’s best-selling Cellulite Defense Gel-Cream. Our customers asked, and we listened. Now NEW & IMPROVED with more NATURAL INGREDIENTs, our ONE OF A KIND formula boasts a unique, customized blend that acts as a powerful, gentle CELLULITE REMOVER to tighten skin so you can achieve a smooth, even skin tone.

SPREADS EASILY - The gel-cream consistency is lightweight and glides over skin smoothly leaving behind only a cool, tingly sensation, and NO sticky residue. Its lightweight texture covers large areas, so a little goes a long way for maximum use. Get more bang for your buck! Perfect to use with a massager, brushes, wraps or mitt!

POWERED BY NATURE - Our formulated blend of natural and organic ingredients uses potent antioxidants such as organic Spirulina, Rosemary and Lemon which help in firming and toning any dimples or orange peel skin. While the gel’s cooling effect is working, caffeine provides a firming boost and helps in circulation and reducing the storage of fat.

ORDER WITH CONFIDENCE - Start using Body Merry’s cellulite defense gel-cream on your unwanted bumps and lumps. If smoothing does not occur or you’re not 100% satisfied, Body Merry offers a 90 day MANUFACTURER GUARANTEE on all its products. Just contact us and we’ll refund your order. You get to keep the jar.

CRUELTY FREE & SAFE - Our products are vigorously tested to ensure that they are safe and free from irritation for all skin types and hair types, but we would never test on animals - we love our furry (and scaly) friends & to show that, we are LEAPING BUNNY CERTIFIED! Our products use wholesome, all natural ingredients & gentle formulas designed for every skin type (sensitive, normal, oily) & hair color (blonde, brunette, redheads, etc) to give you only the best experience possible.
